description: Test suite for the Cohere agent integration in the backend API, including unit tests for basic functionality, streaming, async operations, memory, response modeling, JSON response mode, and session history.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model for movie scripts with title, genre, and plot fields.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: Helper function to assert that response metrics contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal input plus output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic synchronous run of the Cohere agent.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming responses from the Cohere agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous run of the Cohere agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests asynchronous streaming responses from the Cohere agent.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the agent's memory feature across multiple interactions.

methods.name: test_response_model
methods.description: Tests response content structured as a MovieScript model.

methods.name: test_json_response_mode
methods.description: Tests response content in JSON mode with a MovieScript model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests session history management with SqliteStorage.
